overview:
About PCSquad247 (1-800-987-5471)

PC Squad is the worldâ€™s leading technical support service provider offering the best of remote tech-support service with main aim to develop long-term relationship with its customers. To fulfill our aim, we strive to make our service quick yet effective and accurate with 24/7 online support and offer comprehensive solutions of high quality.

We offer wide-ranging services including set-up and installation of various IT products to resolving the problems that our customer can face while using that product. Our certified and highly experienced tech-support team will resolve any problem you encounter in your desktops, laptops, hardware devices and software applications. Kindly, visit our Services page to know more about the array of products and the related tech-support services we offer.
